# generated file
cmake_minimum_required( VERSION 2.8 )
include_directories(    ../include
                        ../include/${CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME} )
find_package( dl )
add_definitions(-DBUILDNO="TEST")
list(APPEND SOURCES o_read_words.c o_read_lines.c oint.c)
list(APPEND SOURCES locals.c)
list(APPEND SOURCES asm.c)
list(APPEND SOURCES methods.c)
list(APPEND SOURCES asm_assign.c asm_method.c)
list(APPEND SOURCES exec_new.c)
add_library(osrc SHARED ${SOURCES})
add_executable( tst main.c )
target_link_libraries( tst PUBLIC osrc values dl )
install( TARGETS tst RUNTIME DESTINATION bin )
